item.description:
SoulCollage® Come for an afternoon of creativity for your soul.  Hundreds of images are provided for you to create you own "deck" of cards using glue and 5x8 mat board.  This July class has a special theme if you want to work with a theme:  Journey Cards!
Journey cards depict our travel through life,  through a tough time, or a happy one...or through any aspect of learning, growing or self-discovery.  Common symbols are spirals, winding roads, labyrinths, stairs, ladders, footprints, mandalas, circles!  Begin now to look for images to bring to class.  Also, I'll have....hundreds!
The class is held in a sunlit healing center with soft music.  Very relaxing.  Express your Soul!  All materials supplied, including my stash of amazing images.  The event runs 1-4 pm, $30.  See samples of SoulCollage®  cards http://ahigherbalance.com/soulcollage.htm.

Go to http://www.ahigherbalance.com/ to see other programs offered for healing and personal evolution.
item.how_to_find_us: Enter door next to H&R Block, go up one flight to suite 6B
item.why: SoulCollage is a fun and easy process to create your own "deck" of cards with hundreds of images supllied. Create cards to use as inspiration or divination. Express your desires, transitions, aspects of your personality, anything!
item.name: SoulCollage
